post:
Unleash the Immense Power of Our Cloud enabled Bullet-Proof Virtual Dedicated Servers and Enjoy Being Relaxed, While Our Dedicated Servers Fulfill ALL of Your Needs!


We’re proud to introduce you to the easy-to-use Citrix Xenserver Virtualization Server, a cloud based virtualization platform that will definitely meet all of your performance hosting needs!
Many global organizations and online business owners are using the immense power of Citrix Xenserver Virtualization, and for good reason: it’s astonishingly robust.
You have the chance to join the VDS hosting revolution!


Have A Look At The Benefits You Can Be Enjoying Today…


True 100% Uptime: We can migrate your server between physical hosts with zero downtime and impact, avoiding any hassle to you.
  • Daily Snapshots: Snapshots are a point in time backup that takes seconds and have no impact on your server’s performance, so you will feel secure.

  • Web Self Service Portal: Get the control you deserve with your own super-easy to manage control panel that gives you every single tool needed in order to manage your virtual server with amazing ease.

  • Blazing Fast Provisioning: We don’t have to build and maintain physical servers, so your virtual server can be provisioned in just a matter of minutes from any template of your choice.

  • Power saving:We care about our environment!

If you decide to join the wide group of people that has abandoned the dedicated server, we will migrate you over to our platform completely free of charge. Yes, you heard right completely FREE.All our Xenserver Hosts and High performance servers are branded hardware, not sub-brands that do not offer the quality and performance that a VDS needs.Our servers have standard 48GB RAM 2x Quadcore CPU’s attached to our Dell Equallogic SAN to allow your Virtual Server to migrate between hosts with zero downdtime.

Now that you know all of the benefits that our VDS servers offer, it’s just a matter of choosing a plan to suit your needs!

We’re offering a 20% Discount for the next 50 customers, and this special discount is run on a first come first serve basis, so act quickly before it’s too late!

PROMOCODE: VPSEARLYBIRD
